===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# root of the [[Starwort]] or [[w:Stellaria|Stellaria dichotoma]]  (a [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to reduce "damp-heat" and treat "yin" deficiency.)
